TopicTitle: 0.22 Career Mode LP - My Kerbal Career Season 2

Articles.Content:
One year ago, I made a series of Youtube videos where I ran a space program on a budget, adding up the costs of rockets and setting contracts for myself. Now, I can do it for real!

NOTE: The first episode was made in an experimental version - I just couldn't wait. All future episodes will be in the latest release build.

EPISODE 1:

EPISODE 2:

Edited October 21, 2013 by dahud
Wow... So the little green men in black suits actually did show up, huh? Glad to see this one back Dahud
Yeah, there was a bit of confusion about who was allowed to what and where, but no one was mad and it wasn't gone long .

I had dabbled with KSP with minimal success before but this video finally got me to the point of understanding what was going on enough to get a rocket into space and back to earth safely again, so thanks very much!!!
You dont have to do to the tracking station after you land. You can mouse over the panel at the top of the screen and the recovery button will appear.

This first episode was made with an experimental version from about a week before release. That recovery button was added pretty late. That said, I'll certainly be using it from now on, if I can remember that it's there!
Just published episode 2! Check it out in the top post.
Idea! I should start taking challenges. Oh, and here's episode 3:
